“What the hell's it all for!?”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“Marlene is…
I think Marlene is safe.”

{Tifa}
“Right before they took {Aeris},
she said, 'Don't worry, she's all right.'
She was probably talking about Marlene.”

{Cloud}
“All three of them were in the pillar.”

{Barret}
“I don't wanna think of them
as dead!”

{Barret}
“This is all screwed up!”{PAUSE}“They destroyed an entire village
just to get to us!
They killed so many people…”

{Tifa}
“…Are you saying it's our fault?
Because AVALANCHE was here?
Innocent people lost their lives because of us?”

{Barret}
“No, {Tifa}!”{PAUSE}“That ain't it!
Hell no!!”{PAUSE}“It ain't us! It's the damn Shinra!
It's never been nobody but the Shinra!”

{Barret}
“They're evil and destroyin'
our planet just to…”{PAUSE}“build their power and line their own
damn pockets with gold!”{PAUSE}“If we don't get rid of them,
they're gonna kill this planet!”

{Barret}
“Our fight ain't never gonna be over
until we get rid of them!!”

{Barret}
“What don't you know!?
You don't believe me?”

{Tifa}
“It's not that.
I'm not sure about…me.
My feelings.”

{Barret}
“Oh yeah, that girl.
What's up with her?”

{Tifa}
“…I don't really know…
but she's the one I left
Marlene with.”

{Barret}
“{Tifa}.
There ain't no turnin' back now.”

You may not take on any more Materia.
